instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-01958 charges the battery but won't power up
threads.message:
this site wouldn't let me renew my subscription with my original account.

this board is charging the battery because it ramps up to 1.8 amps on the meter. it will go into dfu and it will go through a revive but it never powers up at all. pm_slp_sus_l is 3v . pm_slp_s5_l is 0v. is this a chipset issue?

threads.title: 820-01958 charges the battery but won't power up
threads.message:
You've already have same thread on the forum.

Did you fix your subscription problem?
If not, send PM to Louis, is the one can fix it.
